image.title: FULLY XML DRIVEN
image.description: Fully XML driven, this makes it really easy to install and change.

image.title: MODIFIABLE COLOR THEME AND SKIN
image.description: All the colors of the background, scrollbar, borders, buttons, texts etc can be changed, also the buttons graphics can be of any shape or size.

image.title: OPTIONAL THUMB DROP SHADOW
image.description: The thumb drop shadow can be disabled if you don't need it.

image.title: FULL CSS SUPPORT
image.description: The title and description texts can be styled with CSS, this mean that you can change the font, colors, padding, margins etc.

image.title: MULTIMEDIA LIGHBOX SUPPORT
image.description: On thumb click or touch it can open a simple lightbox or an external link, the lightbox content can be a bigger image, a sound player, or video player which can play videos from youtube, vimeo or streming videos from your local computer or your server.

image.title: UNLIMITED NUMBER OF THUMBS
image.description: You can add as many thumb images as you need, the size and shape of the thumbs can be different.

image.title: MODIFIABLE NUMBER OF ROWS
image.description: The number of rows can be set to any number you like.

image.title: EXCELENT MOBILE PERFORMANCE
image.description: It was coded and optimized for mobile devices and it is 100% mobile compatible and of course it will run just as great on PC.

image.title: CUSTOMIZABLE THUMB BORDER
image.description: The border size and color can be set, also the thumb border can be removed if you don't need it

image.title: MULTIMEDIA LIGHBOX SUPPORT
image.description: On thumb click or touch it can open a simple lightbox or an external link, the lightbox content can be a bigger image, a sound player, or video player which can play videos from youtube, vimeo or streming videos from your local computer or your server.

image.title: OPEN A NEW PAGE ON CLICK
image.description: When a thumb is clicked a new page can be opened, the link and target for can be specified.

image.title: WORDPRESS SUPPORT
image.description: The gallery can be embedded in wordpress, how to do this is explained in the help files.

image.title: HARDWARE ACCELERATION SUPPORT
image.description: This gallery is using the GPU (hardware acceleration) for rendering the HTML5 elements.

image.description: The thumb drop shadow can be disabled if you don't need it.

image.title: EASY TO CONFIGURE AND INSTALL
image.description: The gallery can be easily configured and install, full documentation provided in the download files.
